documentation.long: This source creates random points in an octree of blocks to be used with the Streaming Particles representation

property.name: NumberOfLevels
property.label: NumberOfLevels

documentation.long: Set the number of levels in the octree of blocks

property.domains: Value(s) must be in the range ( 1, 6).

documentation.long: Set the number of points generated in each block
Set the seed of the random number generator
